block_info.label: Mixer LUT Stream
block_info.description: Stream-based Mixer LUT block for AI Engines.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: The type of individual data samples output of the DDS function
parameters.label: Output data type:

parameters.name: sfdr
parameters.description: specifies the expected SFDR of dds output
parameters.label: SFDR:

parameters.name: ssr
parameters.description: Specify number of data input/output in parallel for a single channel.
parameters.label: SSR:

parameters.name: input_window_size
parameters.description: describes the number of samples in the input/output window API or number of samples to process per iteration
parameters.label: Samples per frame:

parameters.name: PHASE_RELOAD_API
parameters.description: specifies whether phase_offset reload, if used, is to be non-blocking (RTP) or blocking (iobuffer).
parameters.label: phase_offset reload

parameters.name: USE_PHASE_RELOAD
parameters.description: specifies if initial phase is to be implemented as a reloadable RTP port or not.
parameters.label: Reload initial phase via input port

parameters.name: phase_increment_reload
parameters.description: specifies if phase_increment can be reloaded at runtime.
parameters.label: phase_increment reload at runtime

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: The rounding to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: TP_API
parameters.description: The form of IO: 0 for windows, 1 for streams
parameters.label: API:
